WizardAnswered on 25 Jul 2019If you are talking locally... in the SGX, there really few and far between because we're not a common market for exciting stocks to list in.However, if you just follow the financial news, you will always find interesting companies listing (and particularly tech companies) listing in the US markets.Everyday there seems to be between 3 to 4 companies being listed on the S&P or NYSE markets.You can follow this IPO calender here: https://www.investing.com/ipo-calendar/0 comments0
